title: Can I get banned for using custom animations (visual only) through Wooxy?

replies.body: I think a streamer got banned for this once, because he made eve and twitch etc have a light green glow around their champ so when they're invis they were easier to detect, and he had all kinds of other visual aids, like caits traps were bright bright pink for bushes etc. So he got banned for giving himself an advantage

When talking about custom skins/artwork/animations that alter the way you see or play League, it's always good to refer to [**Riot's general stance on third party programs**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/225266848). If detected, there's a chance that you could be punished for using third party programs like these.
